message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,500,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budgetary concerns, but my initial offer reflected the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,200,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that. How about we try $950,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can agree on a price.
